TopicTitle: Less efficent DELTA-V with EVE, Scatterer, Kopernicus and AVP

Articles.Content:
I have tested the same craft using the above mods, as well as without the above mods. For some odd reason enough Delta V to clear the Kerbin System only provides enough to provide an apoapsis 1/3 the way from the planet? The FPS seems to be constant  between modded and unmodded. Any ideas?

 

-CPTBUG

I am not clear on what you are saying. Do you mean that with the mods, all of them installed, the crafts dV only gets up to 20km (70 being orbit). What happens when you remove one or two of the mods. Does that make any difference?

On 11/26/2020 at 2:49 PM, Cpt72Bug said:

I have tested the same craft using the above mods, as well as without the above mods. For some odd reason enough Delta V to clear the Kerbin System only provides enough to provide an apoapsis 1/3 the way from the planet? The FPS seems to be constant  between modded and unmodded. Any ideas?

 

-CPTBUG

It shouldn't be affecting Delta V at all. Do you have any other mods installed?

19 hours ago, DunaManiac said:

It shouldn't be affecting Delta V at all. Do you have any other mods installed?

I figured it out it seems that one of the mods recommends JNSQ, this modifies the scale of the solar system.
